responsibleGaming.title: Responsible Gaming
responsibleGaming.intro: Winbox is seriously concerned with promoting a responsible and safe gaming environment. Our Responsible Gaming program aims to assist our valued players in making informed, controlled decisions such that the playing experience is enjoyable without causing any harmful effects.
responsibleGaming.ageRestrictions: We have age restrictions, and those are strictly observed and are in line with all relevant laws and regulations. Although we are not a part of regulatory agencies, we recognize and embrace the initiatives of principal agencies committed to responsible gaming and player protection-related activities, such as:

ageRestriction.title: 18+ Age Restriction
ageRestriction.description: The sign is a show of our willingness to enable access to our gaming services only to persons who are 18 years and above, so as to mitigate against underage gaming.

gamcare.title: GAMCARE
gamcare.description: The charity is based in the UK and freely and anonymously offers treatment and support to anyone harmed by gaming. They have a National Gambling helpline, and they provide counsel to players as well as their relatives dealing with excessive gaming.

beGambleAware.title: Be Gamble Aware
beGambleAware.description: A special organization seeking to make people aware of responsible gambling. They offer educational materials, advice, and support services that assist people to play responsibly and even seek help as they should.
beGambleAware.disclaimer: Although these are not direct partners or regulators of Winbox, we support their cause and advise our players to use their helpful resources.

measures.title: We engage in the following Responsible Gaming Measures:

playerControl.title: Player Control Tools - Keep in Control
playerControl.intro: Whenever you are in your account settings, you can put limits to limit your gaming activities responsibly:
playerControl.depositLimits: Deposit Limits: You can manage the amount of money you are depositing daily, weekly, or monthly.
playerControl.lossLimits: Loss Limits: Establish a limit on how much you can lose in a given duration of time.
playerControl.betLimits: Bet Limits: Restrict the amount of bets you put per session or day.
playerControl.sessionLimits: Session Time Limits: Limit the amount of time you can spend playing. The sessions automatically expire after the limits are met.

limitSetting.title: Limit-setting ways:
limitSetting.instructions: To log in to your Winbox account > go to the Responsible Gaming section > select Set My Limit > choose your limits > and save.

selfExclusion.title: Self-Exclusion Program - Take a break when you need it
selfExclusion.intro: In case you need to take a break from your gaming activity:

temporary.title: Temporary Self Exclusion (7 Day Cooling-Off):
temporary.description: The account will be rendered inaccessible and frozen for 7 days. Once after that, it turns on automatically.

permanent.title: Permanent Self-Exclusion:
permanent.description: Ask to permanently freeze your account. It is only after at least 6 months of the request for reactivation that it can be done, which is subject to internal review.

howToApply.title: How to Apply:
howToApply.descriptionAfter: through WhatsApp or Live Chat on the site or through the app. Our group is ready to support you 24/7 and on a confidential basis.

supportEducation.title: Support and education
supportEducation.intro: We give educational content and risk warnings about harmful aspects of gambling to keep you enlightened and allow you to make harmless decisions.

amandaLim.title: Amanda Lim – The Visionary who Leads Winbox Ahead

founder.title: Founder/ CEO: Amanda Lim
founder.description: Established by Amanda Lim, Winbox is the first mobile-first online casino operator built around the needs of the Southeast Asian customer. Having more than 15 years of experience in software engineering and digital marketing, Amanda visualized a casino environment that is safe, easy to use, and highly interactive, serving the exclusive interests of the local market. Since she took over the leadership of Winbox, it has ascended into the ranks of a reputable, innovative platform in Malaysia, Singapore, and beyond at an impressive pace.

education.title: Educational and Professional Foundation
education.descriptionBefore: Amanda is a Computer Science major with a Bachelor's degree and a Master's in Business Administration in Digital Marketing degree holder at the
education.descriptionAfter: . Her educational experience formed the core of her skills in product innovation, system architecture, and customer engagement approaches. At the beginning of her career, Amanda collaborated with many technology companies in the areas of scalable software and digital transformation, and this allowed her to gain the necessary knowledge of how to create strong user-centric platforms.

responsibilities.expansion: Market expansion and business development: Strategic business
responsibilities.innovation: Innovation of products with mobile applications and the ease of use of the products
responsibilities.compliance: Adherence to local gaming laws and advocacy of responsible gaming

leadership.collaborationAfter: , to ensure that Winbox ensures a consistent brand voice and sole owner of player-first communications and informs users with correct and relevant information on time.

birthOfWinbox.title: The Birth of Winbox
birthOfWinbox.description: Amanda noticed that there was a need in the market for an online casino platform that was mobile-friendly, secure, and culturally oriented in Southeast Asia. She set her mind on developing a platform that could encompass the sophistication of technology and the elements of ethical gaming. Together with a group of professionals in software development and regulatory compliance, Amanda introduced Winbox, which soon became a representative of trust and innovativeness in the region.

adversitySuccess.title: Adversity and Success
adversitySuccess.description: The market is quite competitive and controlled, and joining the industry at such a time was a challenge. The commitment shown by Amanda towards compliance, transparency, and the safety of players enabled Winbox to beat the market leadership of the bigger companies. On desktop or mobile, with our platform, everyone can access it with ease and play games with a pleasant experience, so it is the choice of thousands of people who not only want to feel safe but also enjoy games.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: We strive to become a leader in the online casino industry in Southeast Asia by evolving as the most reliable and innovative platform in the region. Our mission is to make an online environment where gamers may be active with a sense of safety and certainty that they are utilizing a place that was created with the qualities of fairness, novelty, and amusement. We are dedicated to constant improvement and ethical practices that would allow us to transform the future of our platform into a new realm of trust and pleasure in online gaming.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: It is our commitment to provide an excellent range of high-end games on fully licensed, audited, and regulator-compliant systems. We strive to make every player feel secure, play fairly, and have an experience that continuously becomes better. With user satisfaction at the core of everything we do, we aim to maximize the creation and maintenance of a platform where entertainment and responsibility collide and where quality and integrity define the creation of each and every game, feature, and interaction.

coreValues.title: Core Values
coreValues.paragraph1: We are a platform that is founded on fundamental values, and every decision and service that we provide is impacted by these factors. We embrace integrity, fairness, and transparency in the way we play games and respond to our customers. Safety of use is also at the top of our values, and we employ state-of-the-art technology to secure the information and privacy of our users.
coreValues.paragraph2: We are always advancing to provide new, thrilling experiences with new games and component highlights. As a good operator, we facilitate positive gambling habits and abide by local laws. Most importantly, we put the players first- listening, adapting, and building experiences that satisfy their needs.

philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy.paragraph1: Online gaming to us is not entirely about chance; it must be fair, it must be secure, and it must even be entertaining. We are not only a game provider but a user-first entertainment platform with the help of smart technology.
philosophy.paragraph2: The basic idea we have is that true entertainment will fall into place once players feel safe, respected, and engaged. That is the experience we are pursuing and are trying to bring to you daily.

hero.title: An Exciting New Dawn For Badminton & Winbox Fans

content.paragraph1: The renewed partnership between Winbox and the Badminton World Federation (BWF) signals a transformative moment for badminton fans around the globe. First joining forces in 2022 as the official gaming partner of the HSBC BWF World Tour Finals, Winbox made a bold entrance into the international badminton scene. Now, in 2025, the collaboration is back—stronger and more impactful than ever.
content.paragraph2: By once again supporting BWF sponsorship, Winbox reaffirms its dedication to the sport and its global community. This alliance is not just about visibility; it's about enriching the fan experience. Through this partnership, badminton enthusiasts can look forward to exclusive tournament updates, real-time match coverage, and deeper insights into the players and teams they love. Together, Winbox and BWF are setting a new standard for how the sport is experienced and celebrated.

overview.title: Overview of BWF
overview.content: The Badminton World Federation (BWF) serves as the official global governing authority for badminton, overseeing the organization and regulation of premier international tournaments. Founded in 1934, the BWF manages some of the sport's most prestigious events, including the BWF World Championships, the Thomas & Uber Cup, and the HSBC BWF World Tour. Through these competitions, the federation maintains the highest levels of excellence and integrity in badminton worldwide.

ranking.title: BWF Ranking System
ranking.content: The BWF ranking system is the authoritative measure used to identify the world's leading badminton players. It plays a crucial role in determining player seedings for major tournaments and serves as a key factor in qualifying athletes for prestigious events such as the Olympics and World Championships. By following these rankings, both fans and players can stay informed about performance trends and look forward to exciting matchups in future competitions.

liveGame.title: BWF Live Game Popularity
liveGame.content: Millions of badminton enthusiasts around the world tune in to BWF live broadcasts to catch the sport's most thrilling moments. The collaboration between BWF and Winbox takes this experience to the next level by providing exclusive real-time tournament updates, match highlights, and detailed statistics. Thanks to Winbox's support, fans can dive deeper into the action, staying connected and engaged with every rally, smash, and triumph.

benefits.title: Why This Partnership Is a Game-Changer for Players

trust.title: Improved Trustworthiness
trust.content: Collaborating with a prestigious global entity like the BWF, Winbox strengthens its standing as a trustworthy, fair, and secure platform. This partnership builds player confidence by guaranteeing that their gaming and betting activities take place in a transparent and highly professional setting.

experience.title: Elevating Your Gaming and Betting Experience
experience.content: The partnership between Winbox and BWF brings together advanced technology, strengthened security protocols, and accelerated payment processing. These improvements create a smooth and enjoyable gaming experience, allowing players to place bets, withdraw their winnings, and interact with the platform with ease and confidence.

engagement.title: Dynamic Event Experiences & Fan Engagement
engagement.content: Thanks to this partnership, Winbox brings BWF-themed events, live betting opportunities, and exclusive contests to the platform. These features elevate the sports betting experience, making it more interactive and exhilarating. Users can fully immerse themselves in the excitement of badminton while benefiting from special promotions and unique rewards.

register.title: Register For An Account
register.content: Winbox register now to unlock exclusive BWF content, including live updates, special promotions, and unique insights into your favorite players and tournaments. Join today and experience badminton like never before with exciting features designed just for fans.

updates.title: Real Time Updates
updates.content: Stay connected with the action by following real-time scores, match results, and up-to-the-minute ranking updates. Whether you're tracking your favorite players or keeping an eye on the latest tournament developments, this continuous stream of information ensures you never miss a moment of the excitement.

performance.title: Access Player Performance
performance.content: Stay up to date with live updates on player standings and performance trends, giving you real-time insights into ranking changes and how athletes are performing throughout the season. This helps you follow the action more closely and anticipate exciting moments in upcoming matches.

cta.title: Join The Winbox x HSBC BWF World Tour Experience
cta.content: Experience BWF live like never before with Winbox Malaysia. Stay updated with the latest BWF rankings, real-time match coverage, and exclusive content that brings you closer to the action. Join the Winbox community today and enjoy unmatched sports engagement and excitement every step of the way.

brandAmbassador.h1Text: Shift into High Gear: Marc Márquez Teams Up with Winbox

intro.description: Marc Márquez, famed for his unparalleled skill, agility, expert cornering, and strategic prowess, has earned a trove of accolades throughout his motorcycle racing career, including multiple World Championships.

winningFormula.title: The Winning Formula
winningFormula.paragraph1: February 17, 1993—Cervera, Spain. A small town gives rise to a force of nature on two wheels. Marc Márquez didn't just enter the world of motorcycle racing—he stormed into it. By 17, he had already clinched the 125cc World Championship. Two years later, he took Moto2 by storm. And in 2013, in one of the sport's most explosive debuts, he conquered MotoGP as a rookie—something the world hadn't seen in over 30 years.
winningFormula.paragraph2: Fast-forward to today: eight world championships, countless victories, and a racing style that blends instinct, courage, and razor-sharp precision. Márquez isn't just fast—he's fearless. Even a devastating injury in 2020 couldn't keep him down. He fought back, redefining what it means to recover, rebuild, and race harder than ever before. Now, Marc Márquez brings that same intensity to a new arena.
winningFormula.paragraph3: Winbox Online Casino is proud to announce him as our brand ambassador for the 2024/2025 season. His bold spirit and hunger for excellence mirror everything Winbox stands for—thrill, precision, and a relentless drive to win. This partnership isn't just exciting. It's a game-changer.

legend.title: Legend in Motion: Marc Márquez Named Winbox Ambassador
legend.paragraph1: As the new face of Winbox, Marc Márquez isn't just joining a brand—he's igniting a movement. Known for defying limits on the track, he now brings that same fearless energy to the world of online gaming, spearheading a bold new era for our platform.
legend.paragraph2: This isn't your average partnership. It's a collision of two high-octane worlds—where the pulse-pounding precision of MotoGP meets the immersive thrill of next-level gaming. Whether you're a motorsport fanatic chasing speed or a gamer chasing the next big win, this collaboration promises a fusion of adrenaline and entertainment like never before.
legend.paragraph3: More than just a marketing campaign, this is a creative alliance driven by shared DNA: a relentless pursuit of excellence, performance under pressure, and a passion for pushing boundaries. Fans can expect a slate of electrifying campaigns, behind-the-scenes exclusives, and high-stakes tournaments—all shaped by Márquez's unique perspective. From custom in-game experiences to surprise drops and VIP access, Winbox is about to feel faster, sharper, and more alive.

paragraph4.text: At the core of it all is innovation. Just as Marc rewrites racing strategy with every corner he takes, Winbox is rewriting the rules of online gaming. With features like our lightning-fast
paragraph4.textAfter: system, we're eliminating friction so players can shift straight into high gear. Together with Marc Márquez, we're not just playing the game—we're changing it.

events.title: Unlock the Thrill: Exclusive Events and Victory Promotions
events.paragraph1: To celebrate this exciting partnership, Winbox is launching a lineup of exclusive promotions and special events featuring none other than Marc Márquez. Get ready for limited-time bonuses, adrenaline-pumping competitions, and rare chances to engage with the MotoGP legend himself. Stay tuned for upcoming announcements—you won't want to miss your shot at winning incredible prizes.

paragraph2.text: Join us in welcoming Marc Márquez to the Winbox family and gear up for an unforgettable ride throughout the 2024/2025 season. Kickstart your journey with a special
paragraph2.textAfter: bonus, crafted in the spirit of motorsport's finest. Your next-level gaming adventure starts now.
